text.more: Visualization demonstrating linking of measures to the ICF. Black nodes indicate inidividual measures. Large external nodes represent domains of the ICF. Use the Search bar to search for specific assessments/measurements. Click on ICF domains to explore all assessments/measurements linked to that ICF domain or click on measures to see linked domains
text.intro: Visualization demonstrating linking of measures to the International Classification of Functioning, Disability and Health (ICF)
text.title: ICF data harmonization visualization

legend.colorLabel: ICF Domain (pink = body functions, green = activities and participation, blue = environment, orange =personal factors)
